## assocObj() function

Reducer accepting key-value pairs / tuples and updating / adding them to an object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assocObj<T>(): Reducer<IObjectOf<T>, Pair<PropertyKey, T>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Reducer<IObjectOf<T>, Pair<PropertyKey, T>>`
